name: Nexus
description:
"ETHEREAL" - a decentralized game universe, which does not have a single direction, style, genre.[/b]



Decentralization is that the player has the opportunity to choose from a variety of elements of mechanics, maps, thereby collecting your gameplay, or create your own by downloading from the Workshop or platform editor.

In fact, in this project there is no concept of boundaries, with system editor "GenCore»
Want to create your Skyrim and go with friends ?
Please!
Create a map, choose mechanics, load voice acting, animation, anything!

However, the game will have a lot of official content, a sort of basic part, called "Encore»

"Encore" - the core of the universe, it loaded a lot of official modes, maps, the main of which is "RealLife Realms" RLR

Before you open the vast expanses of the vast world, where you can fully immerse yourself and feel in the "skin" of your character, complete freedom of action, limited only by the logic of the universe, because it is close to the maximum real!
Build your career, earn, have fun, the world will be built so that each link will depend on each other, the system of economy, politics, in fact, a full-scale world on your computer!
